articles.author: Isobel Koshiw
articles.title: ‘Terror campaign’ on Ukraine embassies continues with more bloody packages - The Guardian
articles.description: Eighteen embassies in 12 countries received packages, all sent from one unnamed European country
articles.content: Eighteen Ukrainian diplomatic missions in 12 countries have received bloody packages in what Ukraine has described as a campaign of terror and intimidation. Oleh Nikolenko, a spokesperson from Ukrain… [+2666 chars]

articles.title: Women and men mistakenly given different advice to prevent heart disease - EurekAlert
articles.description: Women are told to improve their lifestyle to prevent heart disease while men are advised to take statins. That’s the finding of a study presented today at ESC Asia, a scientific congress organised by the European Society of Cardiology (ESC), the Asian Pacific…
articles.content: Singapore – 3 December 2022:  Women are told to improve their lifestyle to prevent heart disease while men are advised to take statins. That’s the finding of a study presented today at ESC Asia, a sc… [+3365 chars]

articles.author: Alexandra Rojas Rodríguez
articles.title: BBVA, Best Global Bank of the Year, according to The Banker - Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria
articles.description: The British publication, which is part of the Financial Times group, selected the BBVA Group as the Global Bank of the Year. The Banker also recognized BBVA as the Best Bank in Western Europe, Spain, Peru and Colombia.
articles.content: The Banker stressed that BBVA continues to progress in its transformation, which gives it the flexibility it needs to test new solutions, form alliances and enter new markets. In this regard, the pub… [+1815 chars]
